channel.title: Releases on OVN project documentation website
channel.description: Recent content in Releases on OVN project documentation website

item.title: Previous Releases
item.description: The following releases are out of date and should only be used if your environment specifically requires them. Please consider using the newest release in the series instead. Series Release Release Date OVN 20.06 OVN 20.06.0 09 Jun 2020 OVN 20.03 OVN 20.03.0 02 Mar 2020 Prior to the 20.03 series, OVN was included as part of the Open vSwitch project.
